snippet.textDisplay: In September 2004, Acclaim Entertainment filed for bankruptcy, registering over $100 million in debt. This meant that the franchises Acclaim had rights to were up for grabs. The Extreme-G franchise was purchased by Throwback Entertainment in July 2006].Throwback has issued word that it will bring its newly acquired franchises to new levels on the next-generation platforms, indicating a strong possibility that the Extreme-G franchise may see the light of day on a next gen console - WIKIPEDIA
snippet.textOriginal: In September 2004, Acclaim Entertainment filed for bankruptcy, registering over $100 million in debt. This meant that the franchises Acclaim had rights to were up for grabs. The Extreme-G franchise was purchased by Throwback Entertainment in July 2006].Throwback has issued word that it will bring its newly acquired franchises to new levels on the next-generation platforms, indicating a strong possibility that the Extreme-G franchise may see the light of day on a next gen console - WIKIPEDIA

snippet.textDisplay:
mate majora's mask is the hardest one i have ever played. i got stuck so many times....im not going to lie i had to use a guide to complete it.

im not sure what really makes it so difficult though. lack of clues. locations to complex? i dont know.

extreme g is great game, only thing i hate is when u get wrecked with weapons and the leaders just piss off and u cant catch them again.

atm im only playing pokemon stadium, mortal kombat 4 and world F1 grand prix 1998 or whatever its called.

snippet.textDisplay: Search "KH Insider MP3" with Google, click the link that says "Free Video Game OST", select the letter 'E', then find "Extreme-G Official Remixes and Original Tracks" in that list. =) I hope this helps. ;)
snippet.textOriginal: Search "KH Insider MP3" with Google, click the link that says "Free Video Game OST", select the letter 'E', then find "Extreme-G Official Remixes and Original Tracks" in that list. =) I hope this helps. ;)
